tgt_text: lokhu kwandisa umuzwa wokuthuka osuvele ukhona ezweni futhi kucekela phansi imizamo yezwe.

src_text: na uri riṋe ri songo ḓidzhenisa kha maitele a u sa konḓelelana hune ra vha na kuvhonele ku sa fani sa zwine ra khou zwi vhona kha maṅwe mashango he u ṱaha ha uvhu vhulwadze ho thoma hone kana hune zwazwino ha vho tou vha luvholelani lwa hone ngei yuropa.
tgt_text: akumele futhi sivumele izenzo zokucwasa esizibone zenzeka kwamanye amazwe ebezibhekiswe kubantu bamazwe lapho ukuqubuka kuqale khona noma endaweni emaphakathi eeurope.

src_text: hetshi tshi tou vha tshitzhili tshine tshi kavha vhathu vha tshaka dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: kuyacaca ukuthi leli igciwane elihlasela abantu balolonke uhlanga.

src_text: kha ri vhe na pfelovhuṱungu kha avho vho kavhiwaho, na kha avho vho vhuyaho u bva mashangoni a re na tshutshedzo khulwanesa.
tgt_text: ake sehlise uzwelo kulabo abathelelekile, nalabo abasanda kubuya ekhaya bebuya emazweni esiwathatha njengayingozi kakhulu.

src_text: kha ri thuse avho vhane vha khou ṱoḓa thuso na vhashayatsireledzo, madzuloni a u vha valela nnḓa.
tgt_text: asisize labo abadinga usizo nalabo ababuthaka, kunokuthi sibaxwaye.

src_text: ri ḓo dzula ri tshi khou fulufhedzea kha zwa ndeme zwa u konḓelelana na ṱhompho ine ya amba uri ri vhonnyi sa vhathu.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka sithembeke ezimfundisweni zokubekezelelana nokuhlonipha ezichaza thina njengabantu.

src_text: ndo imela vhathu vha afrika tshipembe, ndi livhuwa tshigwada tshe tsha vhuisa vhaṅwe nga riṋe u bva ngei wuhan, china, khathihi na vhurangaphanḓa na vhathu vha limpopo vhane vha khou thusa nga fhethu ha u valela vhathu u thivhela u phaḓalala ha vhulwadze.
tgt_text: egameni labo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngibonga iqembu ebelilande abantu bakithi ewuhan, echina, kanjalo nobuholi kanye nabantu baselimpopo abasiza ngohlelo lendawo yokuhlalisa ngabodwana labo abathelelekile.

src_text: ndi zwifhinga zwi konḓaho.
tgt_text: lesi isikhathi esinzima.

src_text: honeha, ndi kha zwifhinga zwi lemelaho hune nungo dzashu dza dzumbululea.
tgt_text: futhi ezikhathini zobunzima lapho kwambulwa khona amandla ethu.

src_text: ri ḓo dzhia tsheo nga u ṱavhanya, ri na ndivho na u ḓiimisela .
tgt_text: sizosukumela phezulu sithathe izinqumo, ngokuzimisela nokuba nenhloso.

src_text: ri ḓo shuma sa ṅanda, sa izwi u bvelela ha ndingedzo dzashu ho ḓisendeka kha nyito dza muafrika tshipembe muṅwe na muṅwe.
tgt_text: sizosebenza ngokubambisana, ngoba ukuphumelela kwemizamo yethu kuncike ekusebenzeni kwawo wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika.

src_text: tshifhinga tsha thuma mina tshi kha riṋe, huṅwe ṱhaṅwe na u fhira mathomoni.
tgt_text: umzuzu kathuma mina ususengamele, mhlawumbe kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: hezwi na zwone zwi ḓo fhira.
tgt_text: nalokhu kuzodlula.

src_text: ri ḓo kunda.
tgt_text: ngokubambisana singalwisana necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba ubhekene nomunyu wesimo esiphuthumayo sempilo yomphakathi esingakaze silinganiswe eminyakeni elikhulu.

src_text: thusedzo ya vhadzulapo vhashu vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza vukuzenzele unnamed mashango manzhi u mona na ḽifhasi a kha nyiledzo dza u tshimbila nga ṅwambo wa khoronavairasi a tshi khou itela u tshidza matshilo a vhathu vhao.
tgt_text: ukusizwa kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amaningi emhlabeni asevale amazwe ngenxa yegciwane lecorona ngokomqondo wokuthi kuzosindisa izimpilo zezakhamuzi zabo.

src_text: ro ita zwenezwo na kha shango ḽashu, fhedzi zwa nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha riṋe zwo dzumbulula zwithu zwi vhaisaho vhukuma zwitshavhani zwashu zwe zwa dzumbulula uri vhushai vhuhulu, tshayandingano na vhushayamushumo zwi khou ṱhukhukanya mvumbo ya vhadzulapo vhashu.
tgt_text: nathi senze okufanayo ezweni lethu, kodwa ukuvalwa kwezwe lethu kwembule iphutha elidabukisayo emphakathini wethu okubeke obala indlela ububha, ukungalingani nokuswelakala kwemisebenzi okuhlukanisa ngayo imiphakathi yethu.

src_text: a hu na vhuṱungu vhuhulu vhu fanaho na uho ha vhabebi vhane vhana vhavho vha lilela zwiḽiwa, fhedzi vha vha vha si na zwine vha nga vha fha.
tgt_text: alukho usizi olwedlula olomzali okhalelwa abantwana befuna ukudla, kodwa benge nalutho abangabanika lona.

src_text: a hu nga vhi na khaṱhulo i si kwayo vhukuma u fana na tshitshavha tshine vhaṅwe vha dzula kha vhukimvi, ngeno vhaṅwe vha tshi khou tambula u swika lufuni uri vha kone u tshila nga zwiṱuku kana vha si na tshithu na tshithihi.
tgt_text: akukho ukungabi nabu lungiswa obedlula umpha kathi lapho abanye baphila ngokunethezeka nokungasweli lutho, ngesikhathi abanye bezabalazela ukuphila ngalokhu okuncane abanakho noma ngalokhu abangenakho nhlobo.

src_text: ndi zwone, izwi ndi zwithu zwi sa thivhelei zwo vhangwaho nga ḓivhazwakale ya tshaya ndingano nahone yo tshinyadzaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: yebo, lena imiphumela emibi eyasala yesikhathi esedlule ebesinokukhubazeka nokungalingani.

src_text: fhedzi hu na ngafhadzo dza u balelwa huhulu kha tshitshavha tshashu tshe kale tsha vha tshi kha khethululo nga lukanda.
tgt_text: kodwa futhi kuyizimpawu zokwehluleka kwethu emphakathini wasemva kobandlululo.

src_text: nyiledzo dza u tshimbila dzi angaredzaho shango ḽoṱhe ho sedzwa khoronavairasi dzo ṋaṋisa zwihulusa thaidzo ye ya vha i hone u bva kale.
tgt_text: ukuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli ngenxa yokulwisana negciwane lecorona sekuvele kwabhebhethekisa kakhulu inkinga elokhu yabakhona.

src_text: kha vhege dzo fhiraho, ro vha ro livhana na zwifhaṱuwo zwi vhaisaho zwa vhathu vho hanganeaho vha tshi khou gwalabela zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa sentharani dza u phakhela na migwalabo ya vhadzulapo vha tshi lwela u ṱahela ha zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: emavikini ambalwa edlule, sesibhekane nezithombe eziletha usizi zabantu abahluphekile bebanga izijumbana zokudla ezikhungweni zokunikezela ngokudla kanye nemibhikisho yemiphakathi ngokuswelakala kokudla.

src_text: ro dovha hafhu ra tea u livhana na mavharivhari a sa ṱanganedzei nahone a vhaisaho.
tgt_text: siphinde futhi sabhekana nezi nsolo eziphazamisayo nezihlazayo.

src_text: mavundu a tshivhalo o ṱanganedza mivhigo ya uri vhathu vha si na mbilu dza u vhavhalela, hune vhaṅwe vhavho vha vha vhaofisiri vha muvhuso, vha khou dzumba kana u rengisa zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa zwo vhetshelwaho vhashayi na vhathu vha si na tshithu, kana vha khou zwi isa kha khonani dzavho na kha miṱa yavho.
tgt_text: izifundazwe eziningana zithole imibiko yokuthi kunabantu abanonya, abanye babo okusolakala ukuthi izikhulu zikahulumeni, bagweve noma badayisa izijumbana zokudla ezihlinzekelwe abantu abaswele nabahluphekile, noma bakuhambisa kubangani nasemindenini yabo.

src_text: arali ha wanala hu na zwi fareaho vhukuma kha mavharivhari aya ri ḓo shumana na vhathu avho lu vhavhaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: uma kuke kwatholakala ukuthi lezi zinsolo ziliqiniso sizobhekana nalabo bantu ngesikhulu isihluku.

src_text: u bviswa ha mulevho wa tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha lushaka na khombetshedzo ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha shango ḽoṱhe ro dzhena kha nyimele ye ra vha ri sa athu i tshenzhema.
tgt_text: ngokumemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele nokubeka kokuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli besizwa amanzi ngobhoko.

src_text: afrika tshipembe ḽo vha ḽi sa athu vhuya ḽa ṱangana na tshiimo tsha shishi tsha mutakalo wa lushaka nga nḓila hei.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika ayikaze yabhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo esinzima kangaka ngempilo yomphakathi.

src_text: ro mbo tea u shuma nga u ṱavhanya u itela u tshidza matshilo.
tgt_text: bekumele sisukume ngokushesha ukuze sisindise izimpilo.

src_text: ri tea u zwi ṱanganedza zwauri kha maḓuvha na vhege dzo tevhelaho, ṋetshedzo ya thikhedzo kha vhadzulapo vha shango ḽashu vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza yo vha i khou ongolowa i si nga nḓila ine ya khou ṱoḓiswa zwone, na zwauri vhukhakhi ho itea.
tgt_text: kumele sikuvume ukuthi ezinsukwini nasemavikini alandelile, ukwesekwa kwezakhamuzi zakule lizwe lakithi ezikhungatheke kakhulu kuhambe kancane kunalokho obekudingeka, futhi sekuvuleke igebe.

src_text: naho zwo ralo, mbadelo ya mindende yo tshimbila zwavhuḓi, nahone nga murahu ha khaedu dza zwa thekhiniki dza tshivhalo, sisṱeme ya khovhekanyo ya zwiḽiwa i khou dzudzanywa.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, ukukhokhwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni kuqhubeke ngaphandle kwezithiyo, futhi emva kwezingqinamba eziningana zobuchwepheshe, uhlelo lokuthunyelwa kokudla luyalungiswa.

src_text: khombetshedzo ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha shango ḽoṱhe kha nḓivhadzo yo itwaho nga tshifhinga tshiṱuku zwo bveledza khaedu nnzhi.
tgt_text: ukubeka ukuvalwa kwezwe esikhathini esifushane kakhulu kulethe izinselelo eziningi.

src_text: ro mbo tea u ela ndivhanele ya phindulo ya lushaka na vhuhulu ha nyiledzo dzine ra tea u dzi ita.
tgt_text: bekumele siqhathanise ubungako bokuvalwa kwezwe nobukhulu bemikhawulo okuzomelwe ibekwe.

src_text: ro fhedzisela ro nanga u wela kha sia ḽine ḽa ri vhea fhethu havhuḓi.
tgt_text: sikhethe ukuba sohlangothini lokuqaphela.

src_text: sa zwe ḽikumedzwa nga vha muhasho wa mutakalo ḽa sumbedza zwenezwino, u kombetshedza nyiledzo dza u tshimbila nga tshifhinga tshe ra ita ngatsho zwo fhungudza phimo ya phirela nahone zwa ndemesa, zwo ri fha tshifhinga tsha u dzudzanya u gonya ha phirela kha dzivhege na miṅwedzi i ḓaho.
tgt_text: futhi ngokombiko owethulwa ngungqongqoshe wezempilo kungekudala, ukuvalwa kwezwe ngesikhathi esakwenza ngaso kwehlise izinga lokusuleleka, futhi okubaluleke kakhulu, kusinikeze isikhathi sokulungiselela ukubhebhetheka okukhulu ekusulelekeni okungenzeka emavikini nezinyanga ezizayo.

src_text: ro tea u sedza u kwamea ha ikonomi yo no vhaisalaho kha tshifhinga tshipfufhi na tshilapfu, nahone u kwamea ha tshinyadzo khulu iyi kha matshilo a dzimiḽioni dza vhathu.
tgt_text: bekumele sicabangele nomthelela emnothweni osuvele untengantenga esikhathini eside nesifushane, nomthelela walokhu kuphazamiseka okukhulu ezimpilweni zezigidi zabantu.

src_text: ri tea u sedza uri vhege dza u valelwa mahayani zwi amba mini kha vhashumi vha sa nga holelwi miholo yavho ya nga misi, kha vha sa shumi na avho vhane vha khou ṱoḍa mushumo, kha avho vhashumi vha tshifhinganyana kana vha tshifhingatetshelwa, kha avho vha re kha sekithara zwadzo, kha vhashayi na vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza.
tgt_text: bekumele sicabange ukuthi ukuvaleleka emakhaya amaviki kuzosho ukuthini kubantu abasebenzayo abangezukukhokhelwa amaholo ajwayelekile, kubantu abangasebenzi nakulabo abasafuna umsebenzi, kulabo abatohozayo, kulabo abathengisa emgwaqeni, kulabo abaphofu nalabo ababuthaka.

src_text: khabinethe i ḓo khunyeledza mutevhe wa maga u fhindula mveledzo dza nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha matshilo a vhathu vhashu.
tgt_text: ikhabhinethi izoqedela iqoqo lamaqhingasu azosetshenziswa ukubhekana nomthelela wokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu bakithi.

src_text: hezwi zwo rangelwa nga tshivhalo tsha nyanḓano na tshivhalo tsha vhafaramikovhe zwi tshi katela vhubindudzi, vhashumi, madzangano a vhurereli, vhadzulapo na khoro ya ngeletshedzo ya ikonomi ya zwa phresidennde.
tgt_text: lokhu kwandulelwe imihlangano ehlukahlukene nalabo abathintekayo kubandakanya amabhizinisi, abasebenzi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, umphakathi kanye nomkhandlu oyala umongameli kwezomnotho.

src_text: vhashumisani vha zwa matshilisano vho vhea phanḓa tshivhalo tsha makumedzwa a a vhuḓidzhenisi vhune ha nga fhindula khanganeo ine ya vha hone na zwezwo ya vhashayi vha vhashayi, vhunzhi havho vha ḓitika nga thusedzo ya zwa matshilisano.
tgt_text: esisebenzisana nabo empha kathini sebelethe izicelo eziningana zokungenelela ezi ngasiza ebuthakathakeni kwalabo abadla imbuya ngothi, iningi labo abaphila ngokusizwa ngumphakathi.

src_text: ri ḓo gonyisa ṋetshedzo ya vhulondoti nga tshifhinga hetshi u thusa miṱa i tshilaho kha vhushayi vhukuma.
tgt_text: sizokhuphula izinga lokuhlinzeka ngezenhlalonhle ngalesi sikhathi ukuze sisize amakhaya aphila ngaphansi kwesimo sobubha.

src_text: naho zwa nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha shango ḽoṱhe zwa fheliswa, mveledzo yayo i ḓo dzulela u tshenzhelwa lwa tshifhinga.
tgt_text: noma sekuphelile ukuvalwa kwezwe, umonakalo wako uzoqhubeka uzwakale kwabanye ngesikhathi esithile esizayo.

src_text: avho vha re na mashudu a u vha na miholo yo khwaṱhaho vha ḓo kona u humela mishumoni yavho; fhedzi kha vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe uyu u ḓo vha ṅwedzi wo lozweaho une vho vha vha tshi ḓo vha vho wana mushu mo wa tshifhinganyana, vho ita vhubindudzi kha sekithara dzazwo kana vho vhulunga masheleni e vha hola u swikela vhuḓifhinduleli ha miṱani yavho.
tgt_text: labo abanenhlanhla yokuba nemiholo engathikamezeki bazokwazi ukubuyela emisebenzini yabo; kodwa izigidi zabanye abantu bazolahlekelwa inyanga lapho bebengabe bethole umsebenzi wesikhashana, ngabe bazenzele amabhizinisi ngokuthengisa emgwaqeni noma bonge imali ababeyitholile ukuze bahlangabezane nezibophezelo zemindeni yabo.

src_text: thikhedzo ya zwiḽiwa ndi maga a shishi a tshifhinga tshipfufhi.
tgt_text: ukusekwa ngokudla kuyindlela yesikhashana yokubhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo.

src_text: zwi ḓo tea u ṱanganyiswa na thandululo dzo khwaṱhaho dzine dza ḓo thusa vhadzulapo vhashu vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza kha zwifhinga zwi konḓaho zwine zwa nga kha ḓi ḓa.
tgt_text: kuzomele kuhambisane nezisombululo ezimile ezisiza izakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka kakhulu ukunqoba izikhathi ezinzima eziseza.

src_text: ndi tama u livhuwa vhunzhi ha dzingo, zwigwada zwa vhurereli na vhadzulapo zwavho vhane vha khou ṋetshedza masheleni na u shuma vha sa nga wani malamba kha u thusa vha tshi fusha avho vha re na nḓala na vhashayi.
tgt_text: ngiﬁ sa ukubonga izinhlangano ezizimele (ngos) eziningi, amaqembu ezenkolo kanye nezakhamuzi zakithi ezinikele imali nokuvolontiya ukusiza ngokudla kwabalambile nabaphofu.

src_text: u fhelisa nḓala a si nyito ya vhuthu.
tgt_text: ukuqeda indlala akusona isenzo sokupha.

src_text: ndi ndaela ya tshitshavha tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsho thomiwaho nga ṱhonifho ya pfanelo dza vhathu.
tgt_text: kubalulekile kunoma umuphi umphakathi ophila ngokuhlonipha amalungelo abantu.

src_text: ri vhukati na nndwa yashu ya u lwisana na dwadze hune u ḓigeḓa zwi nga itisa mutshinyalo.
tgt_text: sisesikhathini empini yethu nalolu bhubhane lapho ukuthatha izinto kalula kungaba yingozi enkulu.

src_text: ndi ita khuwelelo kha roṱhe uri ri dzule ro rafhuwa, u isa phanḓa vha tshi tevhedza milayo, vha dzule vho tsireledzea nahone vha tsireledze na vhaṅwe.
tgt_text: nginxenxa omunye nomunye wenu ahlale eqaphele, aqhubeke nokulandela imithethonqubo, nokuzigcina uphephile nokuphephisa abanye.

src_text: sa muvhuso ri ḓo ṋetshedza mafhungo thwii nga nḓila ya u dzhenelela ine ra khou i dzhia kha u tsireledza vhadzulapo vhashu vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza kha mathada ane a nga vha vhulaisa nga nḓala.
tgt_text: njengohulumeni sizonikezela ngolwazi ngokungenelela okuqonde ngqo esikwenzayo ukuvikela izakhamuzi ezibuthaka kakhulu osizini lwendlala.

src_text: kha vhunzhi ha vhukonḓi vhune vhathu vhashu vha ṱangana naho tshifhinga tshino, u sa ḓivha uri zwiḽiwa zwi ḓoḓa zwi tshi bva fhi a zwi tei u vha vhuṅwe hazwo.
tgt_text: ukusizwa kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amaningi emhlabeni asevale amazwe ngenxa yegciwane lecorona ngokomqondo wokuthi kuzosindisa izimpilo zezakhamuzi zabo.

src_text: kha ri farisane kha nndwa kha ri farisane kha nndwa yashu ya u lwa na yashu ya u lwa na covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed covid19ḽḽifhasi ḽothe nga vhuphara ḽo fara tshi konḓaho nga dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona, ḽine ḽa khou phaḓalala nga luvhilo.
tgt_text: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba wonke awuphelile amandla ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , eselibhebhethe kise okomlilo wequbula.

src_text: khaelo a i athu u wanala.
tgt_text: umgomo walo okusamele utholakale.

src_text: u mona na ḽifhasi, vhathu vha tshivhalo tshi fhiraho 3.4 miḽioni vho kavhiwa na uri ho no lovha vha fhiraho 240,000. ngangoho hezwi ndi zwifhinga zwi lemelaho.
tgt_text: emhlabeni jikelele, bangaphezu kwezigidi ezi3.4 abantu ekwaziwa ukuthi basulelekile futhi bangaphezu kwezi240 000 asebeshonile.

src_text: musi hu tshi tiwa mulevho wa tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha lushaka vhegeni dza rathi dzo fhiraho, afrika tshipembe ḽo vha ḽi na zwiwo zwo khwaṱhisedzwaho zwa u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona zwa 61. naho tshivhalo itshi tshi fhasi, kuvhonele kwa vhaḓivhi na tshenzhemo ya dzitshakatshaka zwo sumbedzisa uri u kavhiwa hu nga gonya nga nḓila khulwane nahone nga luvhilo.
tgt_text: lezi ngempela izikhathi ezinzima.

src_text: ndo amba uri hu tea u dzhiiwa maga a ndeme nahone nga u ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke emavikini ayisithupha adlule, iningizimu afrika yayinezigameko ezingama61 kuphela eziqinisekisiwe zabasuleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: maga ayo – ane a katela nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka lwoṱhe na u valwa ha mikano yashu – o sumbedza u shuma kha u lengisa u phaḓalala ha vhulwadze.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokubuka inani eliphansi, umbono wongoti kanye nesikubone kwamanye amazwe aphesheya kubonise ukuthi ukusuleleka kusazokhuphuka ngendlela eyisimanga.

src_text: hezwi zwo konadzea ngauri vhunzhi ha maafrika tshipembe vho tevhedzela mbetshelwa dza nyiledza u bva mahayani, u ita maitele a u sa vha tsinitsini na vhaṅwe na u ambara masiki wa khofheni.
tgt_text: ngabe sengithi kuzodingeka kuthathwe izinyathelo ezinkulu futhi eziphuthumayo.

src_text: ndi a vha rwelwa zwanḓa kha hezwi na huṅwe u ḓidzima he vha ita.
tgt_text: lezo zinyathelo – okubandakanya ukuvalwa kwezwe jikelele nokuvalwa kwemingcele – okubonise ukuthi kuyasebenza ngempela ukubambezela ukubhebhetheka kwesifo.

src_text: kha luṱa ulu lwa musi ri tshe kati na dwadze, maṅwe mashango a na zwivhalo zwinzhi zwa u kavhiwa u fhira zwine ra vha nazwo.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyenzeka ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi baseningizimu afrika bayilandele imiyalelo yokuvalwa kwezwe, ukuqhelelana nabanye abantu kanye nokugqoka izifonyo zobuso.

src_text: hune ra vha hone zwino – hune ra vha na maḓuvha a 46 u bva tshe ra rekhoda tshiwo tsha vhu100 tsha tshitzhili tsha corona – ri na zwiwo zwo khwaṱhisedzwaho zwa 6,783. italy, ḽine tshivhalo tshaḽo tsha vhathu tsha fana na tshashu, ḽo no vha na zwiwo zwi fhiraho 140,000 ngeno united states ḽi na zwiwo zwi swikaho hanefha kha 700,000 hu tshi khou vhalwa kha ḓuvha ḽa vhu46.
tgt_text: ngiyanibonga kakhulu ngalokhu nangakho konke ukuzinikela esenikwenzile.

src_text: fhedzi izwi a zwi ambi uri phanzi yo pfuka.
tgt_text: kulesi sigaba sokudlondlobala kobhubhane, amanye amazwe abe nenani labasulelekile eliphezulu ukwedlula thina.

src_text: afrika tshipembe a ḽi athu tou swika maṱhakheni a u kavhiwa.
tgt_text: njengamanje – okungusuku lwama46 selokhu sabika isigameko se100 segciwane lecorona – sesinezigameko eziqinisekisiwe eziyizi6 783. izwe laseitaly, elinenani labantu elifanayo nelethu, libe nezigameko ezingaphezu kwezi140 000 kanye nemelika ibe nezigameko eziqinisekisiwe ezilinganiselwa ezi700 000 esikhathini sezinsuku ezingama46.

src_text: modeḽe yoṱhe ya sainthifiki i sumbedza uri phimo ya u kavhiwa i ḓo isa phanḓa na u engedzea nga luvhilo kha miṅwedzi i si gathi i ḓaho.
tgt_text: kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi ubungozi sebudlulile.

src_text: fhedziha, luvhilo lune vhulwadze ha phaḓalala ngalwo na tshivhalo tsha vhathu vhane vho kavhiwa zwi ḓo bva nga zwine ra khou ita zwazwino.
tgt_text: asikafiki esihlokweni sokusuleleka eningizimu afrika.

src_text: ndi ngazwo hune u leludzwa ha nyiledza u bva mahayani hu tshi ṱoḓa u itwa nga zwiṱuku na nga u ṱhogomela.
tgt_text: lonke ucwaningo lwesayensi lubonisa ukuthi izinga lokusuleleka lisazoqhubeka likhuphuke ngesivinini esikhulu ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo.

src_text: ndi nga nṱhani ha zwenezwi hune vhunzhi ha ndaulo dzi tea u dzula dzo ralo na uri ndi zwa ndeme uri vhathu vha dzi tevhedzele.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, isivinini elibhebhetheka ngaso igciwane nenani labantu abasulelekayo lizolawulwa ukuthi thina senzani manje.

src_text: ndi a zwi ḓivha uri izwi zwi lemela hani na uri ndi a pfesesa mbilaelo dzine vhunzhi ha vhafunashango vha vha nadzo nga ha nḓila ine ndaulo idzi dza khou dzhenelela ngaho na u shaedza kha pfanelo dzavho.
tgt_text: yingakho ukuxegiswa kokuvalwa kwezwe kudinga kwenziwe kancane kancane nangokucophelela.

src_text: fhedzi hezwi zwoṱhe ndi zwa ndeme.
tgt_text: kungalesi sizathu ukuthi imithethonqubo eminingi kumele ihlale ikhona futhi kungani kubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi abantu bayilandele.

src_text: ndivho yashu khulwane ndi u vhulunga vhutshilo.
tgt_text: ngiyazi ukuthi kunzima kanjani lokhu futhi ngiyakuqonda ukukhathazeka abantu bakithi abaningi abanako ngokuthi le mithethonqubo igxambukela futhi ibeka imikhawulo kumalungelo abo.

src_text: u sa vha tsinitsini na vhaṅwe na tsiravhulwadze yo teaho zwi kha ḓi vha vhupileli hashu ha nṱhesa kha nndwa iyi.
tgt_text: inhlosongqangi yethu ngukugcina impilo.

src_text: hezwi ndi zwone zwine zwa vhigela ndaulo dze ra dzi vhekanyela u dzi shumisa kha ḽevele 4 ya vhufhinduli hashu.
tgt_text: ukuqhelelana nabantu nokuhlanzeka kuseyizona zikhali zethu ezihamba phambili kulo mzabalazo.

src_text: vhusedzi hashu ho ḓisendeka nga vhuṱanzi ho khwaṱhisedzwaho, data ya sainthifiki na ya zwa ikonomi khathihi na maitele a nṱhesa a dzitshakatshaka.
tgt_text: ilokhu okulawula imithethonqubo esiyibekile esigabeni sesine sokubhekana negciwane.

src_text: kha khaṱhulo ya 1995 ya khothe ya ndayotewa ye i sa ṱanganedze ndaṱiso ya zwa masheleni, vho justice arthur chaskalson vho ṅwala uri: "pfanelo dza vhutshilo na tshirunzi ndi zwa ndemesa kha pfanelo dzoṱhe dza vhathu na tshiko tsha dziṅwe pfanelo dza muthu.
tgt_text: ukucabangela kwethu kususelwa ebufakazini obuqanda ikhanda, ulwazi lwesayensi nomnotho kanye nokusebenza okuhamba phambili kwamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: nga u ḓikumedzela riṋe vhaṋe kha tshitshavha tsho simiwaho kha u dzhiela nzhele pfanelo dza vhathu ri tea u dzhiela nṱha idzi pfanelo mbili u fhirisa dziṅwe dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: ngesahlulelo sowe1995 senkantolo yomthethosisekelo eyakhipha emthethweni isigwebo sentambo, ujustice arthur chaskalson wabhala wathi: "amalungelo empilo nesithunzi yiwona abaluleke kakhulu kuwowonke amalungelo omuntu futhi angumthombo wawo wonke amalungelo omuntu.

src_text: "ndaulo dzine ra khou dzi shumisa dzo tewa kha vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhutshilo na tshirunzi, zwine zwa khwaṱhisedza vhungoho – kha nyimele idzi dzo kalulaho – nyiledzo dza tshifhinga nyana kha dziṅwe pfanelo, sa u vhofholowa kha u ya hune wa funa na u ṱangana na vhaṅwe.
tgt_text: ngokuzinikela kwethu emphakathini owakhiwe ngokwamukela amalungelo abantu sidingeka ukuba siwaqhakambise la malungelo amabili okudlula wonke amanye.

src_text: nga u ita izwi, afrika tshipembe a ḽo ngo fhambana na maṅwe mashango.
tgt_text: "le mithethonqubo esiyibekile ibekelwe phezu kwalokho kuzinikelela empilweni nesithunzi, futhi ezithethelela – kulezi zimo ezibucayi – imikhawulo yesikhashana kwamanye amalungelo, njengokuba nelungelo lokuya lapho uthanda khona nokuba nanoma ubani ofuna ukuba naye.

src_text: nyanganyelo ya thihi tsha ṱhanu ya tshivhalo tsha vhathu kha ḽifhasi vho khethelwa na u valelwa thungo kana vha kha nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka, ngeno tshivhalo itshi tshi tshi khou engedzea nga u ṱavhanya zwi tshi fhindula u gonya ha u kavhiwa.
tgt_text: ekwenzeni lokhu, iningizimu afrika ayifani namanye amazwe.

src_text: izwi zwi katela mashango ane a vha na vhathu vhanzhi u fhira vhashu, sa india i na vhathu vha linganaho 1.5 biḽioni.
tgt_text: inani labantu emhlabeni elilinganiselwa koyedwa kwabahlanu livalelwe ngenxa yesifo noma lisekuvalweni kwezwe, ngaleli nani elikhula ngesivinini ngenxa yokukhula kwenani labasulelekayo.

src_text: mashango manzhi a khou shumisa ndaulo dzi ṱoḓaho vhathu vha tshi vha vhe mahayani nga zwifhinga zwo tiwaho sa zwine ra khou shumisa fhano.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya amazwe anenani labantu elikhulu kunelethu, njengeindia enabantu abayisigidigidi esi1.5.

src_text: u kaliwa ha mitshimbili hu khou shumiswa kha mashango o fhambanaho.
tgt_text: inqwaba yamazwe isibeke izikhathi zokubuya ekhaya njengalesi esisibekile lana.

src_text: kha ḓorobo ya uk na france , paris , u ya fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi zwo kaliwa lwa awara nkene nahone kha tshikhala tshikene u bva hune wa dzula hone.
tgt_text: imikhawulo ekuhambeni ibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src_text: maga a pfareledzo na a thivhelo a fanaho na ashu a khou shumiswa kha mashango o fhambanaho.
tgt_text: euk kanye nakunhlokodolobha yasefrance , eparis , ukuzivocavoca ngaphandle kunemikhawulo yamahora athile ebangeni elithile ukusuka ekhaya lomuntu.

src_text: tsumbo, u rengiswa ha zwikambi nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledza u bva mahayani ho iledzwa kana hu a haniwa fhethu ho fhambanaho na nga mivhuso yapo, hu tshi katelwa zwipiḓa zwa mexico , hong kong na greenland , he ṅwedzi wo fhiraho ho bviswa nyiledzo ya thengiso ya zwikambi nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledza u bva mahayani u itela u fhungudza u kavhiwa khathihi na u ‘itela u langa khakhathi dza u tambudzwa ha vhana na vhafumakadzi.’hu na zwinzhi zwe tshitshavha tsha ṱahisa kha tsheo dza muvhuso dza u engedzwa ha thivhelo ya zwibveledzwa zwa mafola kha ḽeveḽe ya vhuṋa.
tgt_text: izindlela zokugcina nokugwema ezifanayo nezethu zibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src_text: tsheo i ngaho iyi i tou tea u sa ḓisa nyanḓano kha tshitshavha, fhedzi zwo khakhea u humbulela uri dziminisṱa kana phuresidennde vha khou ita kana u amba nga u funa kha fhungo iḽi.
tgt_text: isibonelo, ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe kunemikhawulo ethile noma kumisiwe ezindaweni eziningi ngohulumeni bendawo, kubandakanya imexico , ihong kong kanye negreenland , ngenyanga edlule eyabeka ukuvalwa ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ukunciphisa ukusuleleka kodwa futhi ‘nokwehlisa udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.’sekube nemibono eminingi yomphakathi ngesinqumo sikahulumeni sokwelula ukuvinjelwa kokudayiswa kwemikhiqizo yogwayi esigabeni sesine.

src_text: nga ḽa 23 lambamai, ndo ḓivhadza uri u rengiswa ha sigareṱe zwi nga tendelwa kha ḽeveḽe ya vhuṋa.
tgt_text: isinqumo esifana nalesi kulindelekile ukuthi silethe impikiswano, kodwa akukuhle ukucabanga ukuthi kunongqongqoshe noma umongameli owenza noma osho noma yini afuna ukuyisho ngalolu daba.

src_text: hezwi zwo vha zwo ḓisendeka kha muhumbulo wa khoro ya vhulaeli ya lushaka ya tshitzhili tsha corona (nccc), na uri zwo vha zwi hone kha muhanga wa mvetomveto wo iswaho tshitshavhani u itela nyambedzano.
tgt_text: mhla zingama23 kumbasa, ngamemezela ukuthi ukudayiswa kogwayi kuzovumeleka esigabeni sesine.

src_text: nga murahu ha ndavheleso na therisano dzo sedzwaho zwavhuḓi, nccc yo shandukisa kuhumbulele kwayo nga ha mafola.
tgt_text: lokhu kwakususelwa embonweni womkhandlu kazwelonke obhekene negciwane lecorona (nccc), futhi okwakuqukethwe ohlakeni olwalungakaphasiswa olwaluchicilelelwe ukubonisana.

src_text: nga ṅwambo wa izwo, ndaulo dzo tendelwaho nga khabinethe na u ḓivhadzwa nga minisiṱa vho nkosazana dlaminizuma nga ḽa 29 lambamai dza engedza u thivhelwa uho.
tgt_text: emva kokucabangisisa okunzulu nokuxoxisana, inccc yabuye yabuyekeza isinqumo sayo egwayini.

src_text: hei ndi tsheo guṱe na uri zwiṱatamennde zwo iswaho tshitshavhani nga nṋe na minisiṱa ro vha ro imela, na u ṋewa maanḓa nga guṱe ḽa vhane nda vha ranga phanḓa.
tgt_text: yingakho ke, imithethonqubo eyavunyelwa yikhabhinethi neyamenyezelwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlaminizuma mhla zingama29 kumbasa yelula ukuvalwa kogwayi.

src_text: ndaulo dzoṱhe dzine ra khou dzi shumisa dzo lavheleswa nga vhuronwane.
tgt_text: lesi kwaba yisinqumo esathathwa ndawonye nezitatimende ezethulwa emphakathini yimina nongqongqoshe zethulwa simele, sigunyazwe, yithimba engiliholayo.

src_text: ri tshi khou ḓi ya phanḓa ho vha na vhukwamani ho itwaho na vhaḓivhi vha zwa mishonga, zwigwada zwa vhukhethi na nḓowetshumo dzo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: wonke umthethonqubo esiwubekile ucatshangisiswe kanzulu.

src_text: ro vha ri tshi khou dededzwa nga zwiimiswa zwa dzitshakatshaka na tshenzhemo ya maṅwe mashango.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi senza lokho kube khona ukubonisana nongoti bezokwelapha, izifunda ezehlukene kanye nezimboni ezehlukene.

src_text: ngoho ndi ya uri ri kha nyimele ine a ri na tshenzhemo yayo.
tgt_text: besiholwa izinhlangano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nalokho amanye amazwe asedlule kukhona.

src_text: hu kha ḓi vha na zwinzhi nga ha epidemiology (davhi ḽa saintsi ya mishonga ḽi sedzaho kha u phaḓalala na u langwa ha vhulwadze kha vhathu) ya tshitzhili zwi sa ḓivheiho.
tgt_text: iqiniso ukuthi sizwa amanzi ngobhoko.

src_text: ndi khwine u khakha kha sia ḽa vhulondo ha u thivhela phanzi u fhirisa u badela zwihulu nga u kundelwa zwino u ṋea khaṱhulo ya ḽa matshelo.
tgt_text: kusekuningi kakhulu okumayelana nalolu bhubhane lwegciwane okungaziwa.

src_text: musi hu na mihumbulo yo fhambanaho kha dziṅwe dza tsheo dze ra dzhia – na uri kha dziṅwe nyimele hu na zwi fhambanyaho zwigwada – muvhuso u khou ḓidina vhukuma kha u shuma nga nḓila ine ya bveledza pfanelo dza vhutshilo na tshirunzi kha vhathu vhashu vhoṱhe.
tgt_text: kungcono ukuphambukela ohlangothini lokucophelela kunokuthi kusasa silahlekelwe ngokwahlulelwa.

src_text: u thetshelesa vhathu vhashu na mbilaelo dzavho kha tshifhinga itshi zwo vha tshiṅwe tsha tshiṱaluli tshine riṋe sa muvhuso ro kona nga khatsho u langa dwadze iḽi.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi kusenokwehluka kwemibono kwezinye zezinqumo esizithathile – kwesinye isikhathi lokhu kunombono owehlukanisa abantu – uhulumeni wenza yonke imizamo ukukwenza ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi sabobonke abantu bakithi.

src_text: ri isa phanḓa na u thetshelesa mbilaelo dza vhathu vhashu na uri ro ḓilugisela u ita ndivhanyiso dzi linganyaho mbilaelo dza vhathu nga ha khaedu dzine vho livhana nadzo hu tshi itelwa u vhulunga matshilo.
tgt_text: ekulaleleni abantu bakithi nokukhathazeka kwabo ngalesi sikhathi kube ngeye yezinto ezehlukile esinazo zokuthi uhulumeni ululawule kanjani lolu bhubhane.

src_text: kha tshifhinga itshi tshi lemelaho, nungo dzashu dzoṱhe dzi tea u sedza kha u vhona uri mutakalo na vhutshilo zwo vhulungea, uri nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, maḓi, ndondola mutakalo, vhutsireledzi ha zwa matshilisano na thikhedzo ya tshitshavha a zwi thithiswi.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka ukulalela ukukhathazeka kwabantu bakithi futhi sizimisele ukwenza izinguquko ezizohambisana nokukhathazeka kwabantu ngezingqinamba abahlangabezana nazo nesidingo sokuphephisa izimpilo.

src_text: kha nyimele idzi dzo kalulaho, sa muvhuso, sa vhathu vhone vhaṋe na tshitshavha hu ḓo vha na zwifhinga zwine ra khakha.
tgt_text: kulesi sikhathi esinzima, amandla ethu sonke kumele siwabhekise ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ezempilo nempilo kuyagcinwa, ukuthi ukuthuthwa kokudla, amanzi, usizo lwezempilo, ukuphepha komphakathi nokwesekwa komphakathi akuphazamiseki.

src_text: musi izwi zwi tshi itea, ri ḓo zwi khakhulula.
tgt_text: ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezingajwayelekile, njengohulumeni, njengomunye nomunye nanjengomphakathi ngesinye isikhathi amaphutha sizowenza.

src_text: fhedzi ri tea u isa phanḓa, ri sa laṱi fulufhelo kana vhufhinduli hashu.
tgt_text: uma lokho kwenzeka, sizowalungisa.

src_text: nyimele ine ra ḓiwana ri khayo i ṱoḓa ri na ṱhuṱhuwedzo na u sa fhela mbilu.
tgt_text: kodwa kumele siqhubekele phambili, singangenwa itwetwe noma singalahlekelwa ukuzimisela.

src_text: i ṱoḓa u vha na mbilu yavhuḓi na u fulufhelana vhukati ha vhone, vhadzulapo, muvhuso wavho, na vhukati ha riṋe vhaṋe.
tgt_text: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba wonke awuphelile amandla ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , eselibhebhethe kise okomlilo wequbula.

src_text: dimokirasi yashu i ḓo ri thusa u kunda covid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed ri dzulela u dzhiela fhasi dimokirasi yashu yo khwaṱhaho nahone yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu izosisiza ukunqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sihlale siyithatha kancane intando yeningi yethu enempilo nenamandla.

src_text: ngeno i tshi tou vha yone tshithu tsha ndeme kha nndwa yashu khulwane ya u kunda dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: kodwa ibe kuyiyona nto esinayo kulo mzuzu esikuwo wokuzabalazela ukunqoba ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: ri na vhadzulapo vhane vhunzhi havho vha ḓidzhenisa kha zwa poḽotiki kha ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: sinezakhamuzi ezizib andakanyayo kwipolitiki emhlabeni.

src_text: khetho dza 2018 nga vha senthara ya ṱhoḓisiso ya pew dzo sumbedza uri vhathu vha afrika tshipembe vho ḓiimisela u dzhia vhukando ha zwa poḽotiki nga mafhungo ane vha pfa a a ndeme, a ngaho ndondolamutakalo, pfunzo, mbofholowo ya u amba na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
tgt_text: inhlolovo yangowe2018 eyenziwa ipew research center ibonisa ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika bazimisele ukuthatha isinyathelo sezepolitiki ngezindaba ezibaphethe kabi kakhulu, njengosizo lwezempilo, ezemfundo, ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka kanye nenkohlakalo.

src_text: khetho dzo khwaṱhisedza vhunzhi ha zwine ra ḓivha nga ha riṋe vhaṋe.
tgt_text: inhlolovo iqinisekisa okuningi esesivele sikwazi ngathi.

src_text: ri ḓifhelwa nga u ita nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho vhukuma na muvhuso washu na nga tshashu ri tshi khou sedza mafhungo a no khou ambeswa nga tshifhinga tshetsho.
tgt_text: akukho okusithokozisa njengokuzibandakanya nohulumeni wethu naphakathi kwethu ezindabeni ezisematheni zosuku.

src_text: ri na tshitshavha tsha vhadzulapo vha dzhiaho vhuḓifhinduleli ha u shuma vho ḓiimiselaho u tsireledza pfanelo dzashu dza mutheo na mbofholowo yashu .
tgt_text: sinomphakathi ophapheme ohlezi ume ngomumo ukuvikela inkululeko namalungelo ethu ayisisekelo.

src_text: iṅwe ya tswikelo dza dimokirasi yashu ndi ya uri vhathu vhoṱhe vha afrika tshipembe vha tenda uri ndayotewa i a vha tsireledza na zwauri khothe dzi tou vha mulamukanyi kwao a sa dzhii sia kha madzangalelo avho.
tgt_text: okunye kokunqoba kwentando yeningi yethu ukuthi wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika uyakholwa ngukuthi umthethosisekelo uyabavikela nokuthi izinkantolo zinobulungiswa futhi zingumahluleli ongathathi icala obhekelele okudingwa yibona.

src_text: ndo ḓo humbula nga ha mafhungo haya zwenezwino musi ndo dalela kapa vhubvaḓuvha u ṱhaṱhuvha tshiimo tsha ndugelo tsha vundu kha tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: ngicabange ngalezi zindaba ngesikhathi ngivakashele empumalanga kapa maduze nje ukuyohlola ukuzilungiselela kwesifundazwe ukubhekana negciwane lecorona.

src_text: ndo vhudziswa nga ramafhungo uri ndo vhilaedzwa naa nga ha vhukando ha mulayo vhu sa athu dzhiwaho vhu no khou itela khaedu dziṅwe mbetshelwa dza mulayo wa ndangulo ya tshiwo.
tgt_text: ngabuzwa intatheli ukuthi ngabe ngikhathazekile yini ngombango wamacala okhona okuphosa inselele ekuhlinzekweni komthetho wokulawula kwenhlekelele.

src_text: mulayo uyu ndi mutheo wa ndaulo dzoṱhe dzo khwaṱhisedzwaho kha tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha lushaka we ra u ḓivhadza kha u lwa na tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: lo mthetho uyisisekelo sayo yonke imithethonqubo eyamenyezelwa ngaphansi kwesimo senhlekelele sikazwelonke eyethulwa ukulwa negciwane lecorona.

src_text: u bva tshe tshiwo itshi tsha thoma, vhathu vha tshivhalo vho shumisa pfanelo dzavho u ya dzikhothe.
tgt_text: selokhu kwaqala lolu sizi, abantu abaningi basebenzise ilungelo labo lokuya ezinkantolo.

src_text: milayo ya nyiledza u bva mahayani yo itelwa khaedu kha vhege ya u thoma ya nyiledza u bva mahayani nga mudzulapo zwawe a bvaho mpumalanga we a vha a tshi khou ṱoḓa u vhofhololwa kha thivhelo dza u tshimbila uri a ye mbulungoni.
tgt_text: imithethonqubo yokuvalwa kwezwe yaphoselwa inselele ngeviki lokuqala ngqa lokuvalwa kwezwe yisakhamuzi sasempumalanga esasifuna ukukhululwa ekunqatshelweni ukuhamba ukuze sikwazi ukuhamba siye emngcwabeni.

src_text: kha vhege dza sumbe dzo tevhelaho, ho vha na khaedu dza zwa mulayo dzo bvaho kha tshivhalo tsha vhathu, vha vhurereli, madzangano a zwa poḽotiki, dzingo na kha madzangano a vhubindudzi malugana na ḽiga ḽithihi kana u fhira a mbetshelwa dza nyiledza u bva mahayani dzi sa vha takadziho.
tgt_text: emavikini ayisikhombisa alandela, sekube nezinselele zomthetho ezibuya kubantu abaningi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, amaqembu epolitiki, amangos nasezinhlanganweni zamabhizinisi ezilwisa isinyathelo noma eziningi zokuhlinzekwa kokuvalwa kwezwe abebengathokozile ngazo.

src_text: vhaṅwe vho kona u kunda kha khaedu dzavho dza zwa mulayo fhedzi vhaṅwe zwo vha balela.
tgt_text: abanye baphumelele kulezi zinselelo zabo abanye abaphumelelanga.

src_text: vhaṅwe vho ya khothe nga vhanga ḽa vhuṱhogwa ha milandu yavho he mbilo dzavho dza vhuṱhogwa dzenedzo dza laṱwa nga khothe ngeno vhaṅwe vho wana dziṅwe nḓila dza ndiliso dze vha vha vha tshi khou dzi ṱoḓa.
tgt_text: abanye baye ezinkantolo ngokubhekela ukuphuthuma kodaba lwabo lapho abathole impikiswano yabo ephuthumayo isichithwa enkantolo futhi abanye bathola ezinye izindlela zokukhululeka abebekufuna.

src_text: vhaṅwe vho fhedza vho humisela murahu khumbelo dzavho nga murahu ha nyambedzano na muvhuso.
tgt_text: abanye bazihoxise ngokulandelana izicelo zabo kulandela ukubonisana nohulumeni.

src_text: musi ri tshi nga tama u thivhela vhukando ha mulayo vhufhio na vhufhio vhu dzhielwaho muvhuso, ri tea u zwi ṱanganedza uri vhadzulapo vha sa takadzwi nga nyito ifhio na ifhio ye muvhuso wa nanga u shumisa yone vha na pfanelo ya u ya khothe dzashu u itela thuso ifhio na ifhio ine vha i ṱoḓa.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi singancamela ukugwema isidingo sokuthathela uhulumeni izinyathelo zomthetho, kumele samukele ukuthi izakhamuzi ezingathokozile nanoma yikuphi uhulumeni anqume ukukuqalisa zinelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ukuthola nanoma yikuphi ukukhululeka ezikufunayo.

src_text: izwi zwi tou vha maitele kwao a dimokirasi ya ndayotewa na maitele a ṱanganedzeaho avhuḓi kha shango o thomiwaho nga ndango ya mulayo.
tgt_text: lona ngumgomo ojwayelekile wentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo futhi kuyisenzo esamukelekile ezweni elinesisekelo sokubuswa ngomthetho.

src_text: ri na ndinganyiso dze ra vhea u khwaṱhisedza uri tshipiḓa tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha vhuvhusi tshi kone u imedzana na tsedzuluso dza ndayotewa.
tgt_text: sibeke ngomumo izinqubo ezizogwema amaphutha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni ziyakwazi ukumelana nokuhlolisiswa ngokomthethosisekelo.

src_text: hune ra wanala ri tshi khou shaedza, ri ḓo tea u ṋetshedza vhuḓifhinduleli kha khothe, nahone nṱha ha zwoṱhe, kha vhadzulapo vhashu.
tgt_text: lapho sitholakala khona sifuna, siyobekwa icala izinkantolo zethu futhi, ngaphezu kwakho konke, yizakhamuzi zakithi.

src_text: nga nnḓani ha khothe dzashu zwiimiswa zwashu zwa ndima ya vhuṱahe (zwiimiswa zwi tikedzaho dimokirasi) zwi hone u bveledza pfanelo dza vhadzulapo vhashu, sa zwine zwiimiswa zwo hweswaho maanḓa a vhulavhelesi nga kha mazhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo zwa ita.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kwezinkantolo zethu, umvikeli womphakathi kanye nekhomishana eyengamele amalungelo omphakathi waseningizimu afrika bakhona ukubeka phambili amalungelo ezakhamuzi, kanjalo nezinhlangano ezijutshwe ngokubhekelela amaejensi ezomthetho.

src_text: sa zwe nda vhudza ramafhungo, muthu muṅwe na muṅwe wa afrika tshipembe u na pfanelo ya u ya khothe nahone zwi ḓinga na nṋe, sa muphuresidennde, ndi nga si ime phanḓa ha muthu na muthihi ane a shumisa pfanelo iyo.
tgt_text: njengoba ngatshela intatheli, wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika unelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ngisho nami, njengomongameli, angeke ngama endleleni yanoba ubani osebenzisa lelo lungelo.

src_text: ho vha na, nahone zwi ḓo ya phanḓa u vha na tsatsaladzo yo vhifhaho nahone khulwane vhukuma ya tshivhalo tsha zwithu zwinzhi kha maitele ashu a u lwa na tshitzhili tsha corona, zwo bva kha nzudzanyo na ṋetshedzo ya data, kha mvelelo dza ikonomi dza nyiledza u bva mahayani, na kha milayo.
tgt_text: sekube, futhi kuzoqhubeka kube khona, ukugxekwa okunamandla nokushayisana ngezindlela eziningi zikazwelonke zokubhekana negciwane lecorona, kusuka ekucubunguleni imininingo nokulinganisela, kuya kwimiphumela yomnotho ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe, kuya kwimithethonqubo.

src_text: sa muvhuso a ro ngo ita khuwelelo ya uri tsatsaladzo dzenedzo dzi thivhelwe kana dzi fheliswe.
tgt_text: njengohulumeni asifuni ukuthi lokhu kugxeka kube nentukuthelo noma kuthuliswe.

src_text: kha ḽiṅwe sia u sasaladzwa arali zwi tshi khou fhaṱa zwi a ri thusa na uri ḓowedza uri ri ye phanda nga vhuṱali nga u ṱavhanya ri tshi khou ḓisa phindulo ya nyimele dza tshanduko.
tgt_text: ngakoluhle uhlangothi, ukugxeka, ngokwakhayo, kusiza thina ukuthi sivumelane futhi siqhubeke masinyane futhi kalula ekubhekaneni nokushintsha izimeko nezimo.

src_text: zwi khwaṱhisa khanedzano nga tshitshavha zwa ri fha roṱhe u pfesesa ho ṱanḓavhuwaho ha zwithu zwine zwa khou itea.
tgt_text: kucebisa inkulumompikiswano yomphakathi futhi kusinikeza ukuqonda okusabalele ngezindaba okukhulunywa ngazo.

src_text: ro dzulela u amba zwauri ri ḓitika nga data ya vhukuma, ya zwa ikonomi na ya saithifiki musi zwi tshi ḓa kha u dzhia tsheo na u sika milayo malugana na phindulo yashu kha tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: ngokungashintshi silokhu sithembele kulwazi lwezesayensi, lwezomnotho kanye nolwazi esiluthole ngokubona okwenzekayo uma kumele sithathe izinqumo nokusungula imithethonqubo ukuze sibhekane negciwane lecorona.

src_text: ho sedzwa khonadzeo khulwane dzine dza vha hone kha nyimele hedzi dzi dziedzaho, ro lavhelela u ita vhukwamani na nyambedzano.
tgt_text: okukhulu kakhulu esingakwenza ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezinzima, sihlose ukubonisana nokuxoxisana.

src_text: ri ṱoḓa vhathu vhoṱhe vha afrika tshipembe vha tshi vha tshipiḓa tsha vhuḓidini uhu ha lushaka.
tgt_text: sifuna bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika babe yingxenye yalo mzamo kazwelonke.

src_text: maipfi a vhadzulapo zwavho a tea u dzulela u pfiwa kha tshifhinga tsha ndeme tshi fanaho na hetshi.
tgt_text: imibono yezakhamuzi zakithi kumele iqhubeke ilalelwe ngesikhathi esinzima njengalesi.

src_text: dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona na maga e ra a dzhia u lwisana naḽo zwo pfisa vhuṱungu vhukuma vhathu vhashu.
tgt_text: ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona kanye nezinyathelo esizithathile ukulwa nalo sekulethe umthwalo kubantu bakithi.

src_text: zwo vhanga u khakhisea ha zwithu na vhuleme vhuhulu.
tgt_text: sekudale ukuphazamiseka okukhulu nobunzima.

src_text: naho ri tshi nga sumba mvelaphanḓa dze ra dzi ita u lengisa phiriso ya vairasi, vhuiwa vhu tshe kule.
tgt_text: yize singayikhomba inqubekelaphambili esesiyenzile ekubambezeleni ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane, iseyinde indlela esisazoyihamba.

src_text: miṅwedzi na vhege dzi re phanḓa zwi ḓo lemela nahone zwi ḓo ṱoḓa vhunzhi ha zwithu kha vhathu vhashu.
tgt_text: amaviki nezinyanga ezizayo zizoba nzima futhi zizofuna okukhulu ebantwini bakithi.

src_text: dwadze ngauralo ḽi ḓo isa phanḓa na u vhea mutsiko muhulu kha tshitshavha tshashu na kha zwiimiswa zwashu.
tgt_text: ubhubhane luzoqhubeka lubeke ubunzima obukhulu emphakathini wakithi nasezikhungweni zethu.

src_text: naho ri tshi khou vula ikonomi nga zwiṱuku, u kwamea kha nyimele dza thundu dza vhathu hu ḓo vha huhulu.
tgt_text: noma sivula kancane kancane umnotho, umthelela ezimweni zezinto zabantu uzoba mkhulu.

src_text: arali mafhungo aya ri tshe ro livhana nao, khonadzeo ya khuḓano, u shaya pfano na u sa fushea zwi ḓo dzula zwi hone.
tgt_text: uma kuzobe kusasenjalo, amathuba okungqubuzana, ukungezwani nokungagculiseki kuzohlale kukhona.

src_text: musi ri tshi khou sumba nḓila gabelo iḽi ḽi ofhisaho, ndayotewa yashu ndi nyendedzi yashu ya ndeme na tshitsireledzi tshashu tshi ṱhonifheaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: njengoba sisesizibeni esimanzonzo, umthethosisekelo wethu yiwona nkombandlela yethu ebalulekile futhi neyigugu lethu lokuzivikela.

src_text: dimokirasi yashu yo khwaṱhaho i ri ṋetshedza nungo na maanḓa ane ra a ṱoḓa u kunda khakhathi iyi i konḓaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu enamandla ihlinzeka amandla kanye nokuqina esikudingayo ukunqoba lolu sizi olungaka.

src_text: musi muvhuso u tshi dzhiela nṱha uri vhunzhi ha vhaiti vha khumbelo khothe vha ṱuṱuwedzwa nga zwi vhuedzaho vhathu vhoṱhe, na zwenezwo ri tea u ṱalusa uri tsheo dzo dzhiwaho nga muvhuso dzi kwao nahone dzo itelwa u bveledzisa, hu si u vhaisa madzangalelo a maafrika tshipembe.
tgt_text: njengoba uhulumeni ekubonga ukuthi izicelo eziningi zenkantolo zigqugquzelwa okuhle okufanayo, ngakhoke nathi kumele sibone ukuthi izinqumo ezithathwa nguhulumeni zenziwa ngesihle futhi zenzelwe ukwenza ngcono, hhayi ukulimaza, izidingo zabantu baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: tsha ndemesa kha riṋe ndi u dzulela u phulusa matshilo.
tgt_text: okuseqhulwini kunakho konke kusalokhu kungukusindisa izimpilo.

src_text: tsheo yashu iṅwe na iṅwe i langwa nga ṱhoḓea ya u bveledzisa pfanelo dza vhutshilo na tshirunzi sa zwe zwa dzulisa zwone kha ndayotewa yashu.
tgt_text: zonke izinqumo zethu ziholwa isidingo sokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi njengoba kubekiwe kumthethosisekelo wethu.

src_text: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u ṱanganedza mihumbulo yo fhambanaho – nangwe i thungo kha ya vhaṅwe malugana na phindulo yashu ya lushaka kha tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka samukele imibono eyehlukile ngisho nephikisayo mayelana ngendlela kazwelonke esibhekana ngayo negciwane lecorona.

src_text: mihumbulo yoṱhe i ri thusa u shuma khwiṋe nahone zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: yonke imibono ilusizo futhi iyasisiza ukusebenza kangcono nangobuchule.

src_text: nḓowelo ya u shumisa mbofholowo dza vhuḓipfi, nyanḓano na u amba ndi tshikalo tsha mutakalo wavhuḓi wa dimokirasi yashu.
tgt_text: ukusetshenziswa kwesisekelo senkululeko yokudlulisa lokhu ofisa ukukusho, ukuzibandakanya kanye nokukhuluma kuyisilinganiso sempilo enhle yentando yeningi yethu.

src_text: fhedzi zwi fhiraho izwo, pfanelo idzi ndi dza ndeme kha mvelaphanda ya nndwa yashu ya guṱe khathihi na lushaka lwashu ya u kunda tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu izosisiza ukunqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sihlale siyithatha kancane intando yeningi yethu enempilo nenamandla.

src_text: afrika tshipembe ḽo pfukela kha ḽevele ya 3 vukuzenzele unnamed muphuresidennde vho cyril ramaphosa vho ḓivhadza zwauri afrika tshipembe ḽi khou ḓo pfukela kha ḽevele ya 3 u thoma nga ḽa 01 fulwi – hune sekhi thara nnzhi dza ikonomi dza khou ḓo vula na u bviswa ha tshivhalo tsha nyiledzo kha u tshimbila ha vhathu.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika iya esigabeni sokuqapha sesithathu vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uye wamemezela enku lumweni yakhe ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika seyedlulele esigabeni sesithathu ma nje nokuqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangulana nemikhakha eminingi eyehlukene ivulile ukusebenza nokuxegiswa kwemikhawulo yokuhamba kwabantu.

src_text: zwenezwino musi vha tshi khou amba na lushaka nga ha mveledziso dza tshiṱirathedzhi tsha khwinifhadzo ya khonadzeo ya khombo tsha afrika tshipembe u langa u phaḓalala ha (covid19), muphuresi dennde vho amba zwauri shango ḽi ḓo shumisa maitele o fhambanyiswaho u sedzana na vhupo vhune ha vha na tshiimo tshi re nṱhesa tsha u kavhiwa na phiriselo.
tgt_text: echaza enkulumweni yakhe yakamuva mayelana nenqu bekelaphambili emaswini ange nabungozi ahleliwe okubhe kana nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19), umongameli uthe izwe selizoba nendlela ehlukile yokubhekana ngqo nalezo zindawo ezinamazinga aphezulu okwesuleleka kanye nokusabalala kwalolu bhu bhane.

src_text: tshivhilelani tsha covid19vhupo uvhu ho ḓivhadzwa sa tshivhilelani tsha tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: izindawo eziyizizinda zecovid19lezi zindawo zimenyezelwe njengezizinda zegciwane lecorona.

src_text: vhu katela ḓorobo khulwane dzi tevhelaho: ḓorobo ya tshwane ḓorobo ya johannesburg ekurhuleni ethekwini nelson mandela bay buffalo city na cape town.
tgt_text: lezi zindawo zibandakanya la madolobha: etshwane egoli ekurhuleni ethekwini enelson mandela bay ebuffalo city ekapa.

src_text: vhupo vhuṅwe he ha ṱaluswa sa tshivhilelani ndi mimasipala ya tshiṱiriki tsha phendelashango ya vhukovhela, overberg na cape winelands ngei kapa vhukovhela, tshiṱiriki tsha chris hani ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha, na tshiṱiriki tsha ilembe ngei kwazulunatal.
tgt_text: ezinye zezindawo ezikhonjwe njengezizinda kusewest coast, eoverberg kanye nasecape winelands nekusifunda somasipala wasesifundazweni sasentshonalanga kapa, isifunda ichris hani esi ngaphansi kwempumalanga kapa, kanye nesifunda ilembe esingaphansi kwesifundazwe sakwazulunatali.

src_text: tshivhilelani hu ṱalutshedzwa sa vhupo vhune ha vha na vhathu vha fhiraho vhaṱanu vho kavhiwaho kha vhathu vha 100 000 zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe kana hune u kavhiwa ha vha hu khou gonya nga luvhilo.
tgt_text: indawo eyisizinda ichazwa njengendawo enabantu abathelelekile abangaphezulu kwabahlanu kubantu abayizi100 000 noma kube yileyo ndawo enezinga lokusuleleka okusha okukhuphuka ngesi vinini esikhulu.

src_text: u imedzana na vairasi kha vhupo uvhu, muvhuso u ḓo thoma u ṋetshedza thusedzo khulwanesa wo sedza kha u tsitsela fhasi tshivhalo tshiswa tsha vha kavhiwaho.
tgt_text: ukuze sikwazi ukulwa naleli gciwane kulezi zindawo, uhulumeni uzoqalisa ukungenelela ngamandla nahlose ngakho ukwehlisa isibalo esisha sabantu abesulelekayo.

src_text: muphuresidennde vho amba uri: "ri khou vhea maga a vhulavhelesi o khwiniswaho, ndaulo na ndango ya u kavhiwa.
tgt_text: "sizothatha izinyathelo ezithe thuthu zokubhekisisa lezi zindawo ezinobungozi, ukulawula ukusuleleka kanye nokulandelelwa kwakho.

src_text: ri ḓo vhea tshigwada tsha vhashumi vha re na tshenzhemo vha tshifhinga tshoṱhe kha vhupo huṅwe na huṅwe hune ha vha tshivhilelani.’’tshigwada itshi tshi ḓo katela vhaḓivhi vho gudelaho malwadze a no ṱaha vhathuni, madokotela, manese, vhashumi vha zwa mutakalo vha tshitshavha, vhaḓivhi vha zwa mutakalo wa lushaka na tshumelo ya zwa mutakalo ya shishi, tshi ḓo tikedzwa nga vhaḓivhi vha zwa dzilafho vha cuba.
tgt_text: sizothumela iqembu lochwephe she kuleso naleso sizinda," kusho umongameli.

src_text: "ri ḓo ṱumanya vhupo ha tshivhilelani huṅwe na huṅwe na tshumelo dza u linga, zwiimiswa zwa u ḓikhethela thungo, zwiimiswa zwa khwaranthini, dzilafho, mimbete ya sibadela na u londa vho kwamanaho na muthu o kavhiwaho.
tgt_text: le liqembu lizobandakanya odokotela bokwelashwa kwezifo, odokotela bezo kwelashwa komndeni, abahle ngikazi, onompilo, ongoti bezokuphathwa kwezimpilo zomphakathi kanye nabophiko lokwelashwa okuphuthumayo, elizosekwa ngongoti basecuba.

src_text: vho amba uri: "arali zwa nga itea, tshipiḓa tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha shango tshi nga humiselwa kha ḽevele ya 4 kana ya 5 arali u phaḓalala ha phiriso ha sa langea naho ro ṋetshedza thusedzo nahone hu na khonadzeo ya khombo ya u ḓalesa ha vhalwadze hu sa langeiho kha zwiimiswa zwashu zwa mutakalo.’’mutevhe wa vhupo ha tshivhilelani vhu ḓo sedzuluswa vhege mbili dziṅwe na dziṅwe zwi tshi bva kha mvelaphanḓa ya vairasi.
tgt_text: "sizoxhumanisa isizinda segciwane ngasinye nezinsizakalo zokuhlolela leli gciwane, izindawo zokuhlala wedwana, izindawo zokugonqa zalabo asebehaqekile, ukwelashwa, imibhede yasesibhedlela kanye nokuthungatha labo abake bahlangana nalowo ogulayo.

src_text: u vula ikonomiu dzhena kha ḽevele ya 3 hune ha ḓo thoma nga ḽa 1 fulwi, hu katela u humela mushumoni ha sekhithara dza ikonomi nnzhi, hu tshi khou tevhedzwa phurothokhoḽo dza zwa mutakalo dzo khwaṱhaho na milayo ya zwa u sia tshikhala vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe.
tgt_text: "uma ngabe kunesidingo kungenzeka ukuthi, noma yiyiphi ingxenye yezwe ibuyele esigabeni sokuqapha sesine noma sesihlanu uma ngabe ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane kungathibeki ngisho sekunge nelelwa futhi kunobungozi bokukhungatheka kwezi khungo zethu zezempilo," kusho yena.

src_text: vhashumeli vha tshitshavha vhanzhi na vhone vho humela mushumoni zwi tshi ya nga mbetshelwa dza mulayo wa tsireledzo na mutakalo wa vhashumi mushumoni na nga nyendedzi dza muhasho wa tshumelo dza vhathu na ndaulo, i tshi khou shumisana na miṅwe mihasho yoṱhe kha muvhuso.
tgt_text: uhlu lwezindawo eziyizizi nda zegciwane luzobuyekezwa njalo emva kwamaviki amabili ngokuzoya ngokubhebhetheka kwegciwane.

src_text: nzudzanyo dza mushumoni na phurothokhoḽomusi sekhithara nnzhi dza ikonomi dzo vula, muvhuso u ḓo ḓitika nga vhukwamani na lushaka u tshi khou shumisana na vhashumisani vhoṱhe vha ndeme u lugisa zwithu zwa ndeme zwi re na khonadzeo ya khombo mushumoni hu na vhuṱumani vhukati ha vhashumi na tshitshavha.
tgt_text: ukuvulwa komnothoukuqaliswa ngokusemthe thweni kwesigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, nesiqale ekuqaleni kukanhlangulana, kufake phakathi ukubuyiselwa kokusebenza ngokujwayelekile kwemikhakha emini ngi yomnotho, ngokulandela imithetho eqinile yezempilo nokuziqhelelanisa nabantu.

src_text: vho amba uri: "ngauralo ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou khunyeledza tshivhalo tsha phurothokhoḽo dza sekhithara nahone ri ḓo ṱoḓa khamphani iṅwe na iṅwe i tshi bveledza nzudzanyo ya mushumoni musi vha sa athu vula.’’u ya nga nzudzanyo hedzi, khamphani dzi ḓo tea u dzudzanya zwishumiswa na maga a zwa u sia tshikhala vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe na zwa vhuthathatzhili; vha ḓo tea u ṱola vhashumi musi vha tshi swika mushumoni ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe, ya khethela thungo avho vhane vha ḓo vha vho kavhiwa na u ita nzudzanyo dza uri vha itwe ndingo.
tgt_text: abasebenzi bakahulumeni a baningi babuyelile emsebenzini ngokuhambisana nemibande la ehambisana nokusebenza komthetho wezempilo kanye nokuphepha emsebenzini, nangokuholwa ngumnyango wezemisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nokuphathwa kwayo ngokusebenzisana neminye iminyango kahulumeni.

src_text: muphuresidennde vho amba uri: "dzi ḓo tea u thusa nga u londa vhoṱhe vho kwamanaho na muthu o kavhiwaho arali vhashumi vho itwa ndingo vha wanala vhe phosethivi.
tgt_text: imithetho kanye nezinhlelo ezindaweni zokusebenzanjengoba imikhakha eminingi yomnotho ivula, uhulumeni uzothembe la kakhulu ezenzweni za bantu bomphakathi naba bambiqhaza ababalulekile ukubhekana nobungozi ezindaweni zokusebenza kanye nalapho abasebenzi behlangana nomphakathi.

src_text: nga mulandu wa u nga ḓo balelwa u ḓitsireledza, vhashumi vhoṱhe vhane vha na vhukale ha miṅwaha i fhiraho 60 na avho vha re na nyimele dza malwadze a tshifhinga tshilapfu u fana na vhulwadze ha mbilu, swigiri, vhulwadze ha kufemele vhu sa fholiho na khentsa vha tea u dzula hayani.
tgt_text: "ngakhoke sizophothula imithetho eminingi yakulo mkhakha futhi sizodinga ukuba zonke izinkampani zakhe izinhlelo mayelana nokusebenza kwazo ngaphambi kokuvulwa," kusho yena.

src_text: vhashumi vhane vha nga shuma vhe hayani vha tea u tendelwa vha ita ngauralo.
tgt_text: ngokwalezi zinhlelo, izinkampani kufanele zihlinzeke izibulalimagciwane kanye nokuziqhele lanisa nabantu; kumele zixilonge abasebenzi nsuku zonke uma befika, zigo nqise labo asebesulelekile ngaleli gciwane futhi zenze izinhlelo zokuba bahlolwe.

src_text: ho sedzwa maga haya, tshumelo dzoṱhe dza vhubveledzi, migodi, dza zwa u fhaṱa, dza zwa masheleni, phurofeshinaḽa na vhubindudzi, thekinoḽodzhi ya zwa mafhungo, vhudavhidzani, tshumelo dza muvhuso na vhoramafhungo, dzi ḓo vulwa u bva nga ḽa 01 fulwi.
tgt_text: "kumele ziphinde zisize ngokuthungatha labo asebehlangane nalowo osehaqwe yileli gciwane.

src_text: nzudzanyo dzo teaho dza u vula nga huswa u ya nga luṱa nga luṱa dzi ḓo tea u itwa mushumoni muṅwe na muṅwe.
tgt_text: ngenxa yobuthakathaka babo, bonke abasebenzi abaneminyaka engaphezulu kwengama60 ubudala futhi abanezifo eziyimbelesela okunga ba isifo senhliziyo, isifo sikashukela, izifo eziphathelene nokuphefumula kanye nomdlavuza kumele bahlale ekhaya," kusho umongameli.

src_text: vho amba uri: "mabindu maṱuku na holosela zwi ḓo vula tshoṱhe, zwi tshi katela mavhengele, zwiphaza na vhavhambadzi zwavho.
tgt_text: abasebenzi abakwaziyo ukusebenzela emakhaya kumele bavunyelwe ukwenza kanjalo.

src_text: mbambadzo nga eḽekithroniki dzi ḓo dzula dzi hone.
tgt_text: ukulandela lezi zinyathe lo, zonke izimboni ezikhi qizayo, izimayini, abakhi, abezezimali, imisebenzi ekhokhelwayo namabhi zinisi, ubuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha, abe zokuxhumana, imisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nabezindaba, baqalile ukuse benza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangu lana.

src_text: sekhithara dziṅwe dze dza vula tshifhinga tsho fhiraho, dzi ngaho sa vhulimi na zwa maḓaka, tshumelo dza masipala na muvhuso, tshumelo dza zwa dzilafho, mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa na vhubveledzi ha zwibveledzwa zwa tsiravhulwadze, zwi ḓo dzula zwo vula tshoṱhe.’’mishumo ya mveledziso ya ikonomi i re na khonadzeo ya khombo khulwane yo iledzwamishumo ya mveledziso ya ikonomi i re na khonadzeo ya khombo i re nṱha i ḓo dzula yo iledzwa.
tgt_text: amalungiselelo okuqala kahle ukusebenza ngokwezigaba kanye nokufakwa kwezinhlelo kuzokwenziwa kuzo zonke izindawo zokusebenzela.

src_text: izwi zwi katela: dziresitorente, dzibara na dzithaveni, nga nnḓani ha u tou isa kana u ḓa wa dzhia zwiḽiwa wa ṱuwa.
tgt_text: "abathengisi kanye nohwebo lwezitolo kuzovulwa ngokuphelele nakho, okubandakanya izitolo, iziphaza kanye nabathengisi basemgwaqeni.

src_text: madzulo na u enda tshikhalani nga mabupo a fhano hayani, nga nnḓani ha u enda kha zwa mushumo, zwine zwa ḓo dzheniswa nga maḓuvha ane a ḓo ḓivhadzwa.
tgt_text: ukuthenga ngeinthanethi kuzoqhubeka kusebenze.

src_text: khonferentsi, vhuṱambo, vhumvumvusi, na zwa mitambo.
tgt_text: eminye imikhakha eyayi vele seyivuliwe, njengezoli mo kanye nezamahlathi, izinsiza ezibalulekile, usizo lokwelapha, ukukhiqizwa kokudla kanye nokukhiqizwa kwemikhiqizo ye nhlanzeko, izoqhubeka nayo isebenze," kusho yena.

src_text: tshumelo dza ndondolo ya muthu ene muṋe, zwi tshi katela tshumelo dza zwa lunako na u ita mavhudzi.
tgt_text: imisebenzi yomnotho enobungozi obuphezulu ayivumelekileimisebenzi enobungozi obuphezulu izoqhubeka nokungavumeleki.

src_text: u tshimbila ha vhathu na u rengisa zwikambivhathu vha ḓo tendelwa u ita nyonyoloso tshifhinga tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe, tenda zwa sa itwe nga tshigwada.
tgt_text: le mi sebenzi ibandakanya: izindawo zokuhlala phansi udle, izindawo ezithengisa nezokuphuzela utshwala, ngapha ndle uma kuhanjiswa noma kulandwe ukudla.

src_text: nyiledzo dza u tshimbila ha vhathu nga zwifhinga zwo tiwaho zwi ḓo fheliswa.
tgt_text: izindawo zokuhlala kanye nezindawo zokuhamba ngezindiza zalapha ekhaya, ngaphandle uma uhamba ngomsebenzi, okuzo vunyelwa ngezinsuku ezisazomenyezelwa ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: muphuresidennde vho amba uri: "zwikambi zwi ḓo rengiswa zwa nwelwa mahayani fhedzi zwi fhasi ha maga o khwaṱhaho vhukuma, nahone kha maḓuvha o tendelwaho na nga awara dzo pimiwaho.
tgt_text: izingqungquthela, imi cimbi, ukuzijabulisa kanye nemidlalo.

src_text: nḓivhadzo malugana na izwi i ḓo itwa musi ro no khunyeledza nyambedzano na vha sekhithara iyi nga ha maitele o fhambanaho.
tgt_text: ukuzicwala, okubandakanya ukulungiswa kwezinwele kanye nemisebenzi nokuziphaqu la.

src_text: "u rengisa zwibveledzwa zwa fola zwi ḓo dzula zwo iledzwa kha ḽevele ya 3, nga mulandu wa khonadzeo ya khombo kha mutakalo ine ya ṱumanywa na u daha.
tgt_text: ukuhamba kwabantu kanye nokuthengiswa kotshwalaabantu bazovunyelwa ukuba bakwazi ukuzivocavoca noma nini ngezikhathi zasemini, kuye ngokuthi lokho abakwenzi ngamaqembu.

src_text: vho amba uri: "maguvhangano oṱhe a ḓo dzula o iledzwa, nga nnḓani ha mbulungo dzine dzi tea u vha na vhathu vha sa fhiriho 50 kana miṱangano mushumoni ine ya vha na ndivho ya zwa mushumo fhedzi."
tgt_text: umthetho we washi ovimbela ukuhamba kwabantu uzosuswa.

src_text: kha vha lavhelele u gonya ha u kavhiwa nga vhulwadze muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho amba uri, musi hu tshi khou dzudzanyelwa u gonya ho lavhelelwaho ha u kavhiwa nga covid19 kha shango, mimbete ya sibadela ya henefha kha 20 000 i hone, nahone i ḓo shumiselwa vhalwadze vha covid19, na zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana u itela ndondolo ya shishi zwa 27 zwi khou fhaṱwa u mona na shango.
tgt_text: "utshwala bungathengi swa ukuphuzelwa ekhaya ngaphansi kwemigomo eqinileyo, ngezinsuku ezithile futhi ngamahora athile.

src_text: "tshivhalo tsha zwibadela izwi zwo lugela u ṱanganedza vhalwadze vha tshitzhili tsha corona."
tgt_text: izimemezelo ezihambisana nalokhu zizo kwethulwa uma sekupho thulwe izingxoxo kuleyo mikhakha eyahlukene," kusho umongameli.

src_text: muphuresidennde vho amba uri muvhuso u livhuwa mushumo une wa khou ya phanḓa na u itwa nga vhashumeli vha tshitshavha, nga maanḓa avho vhane vha tou vha mbali kha u lwisana na covid19.
tgt_text: ukuthengiswa kuka gwayi kuzoqhubeka nokungavunyelwa kulesi sigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, ngenxa yobu ngozi bempilo yabantu obuhambisana nokubhema.

src_text: "tsireledzo ya vhashumi vhoṱhe, zwi tshi katela vhashumi vha muvhuso, tshi tou vha tshithu tsha ndeme kha riṋe.
tgt_text: "yonke imibuthano yomphakathi ayivunyelwe, ngaphandle kwemingcwabo enabantu abangadluli kuma50 noma imihlangano ezindaweni zokusebenza ngezinhloso zemisebenzi," kusho yena.

src_text: ri ḓo isa phanḓa u ita ndingedzo dzoṱhe ri tshi itela ṋetshedzo yo teaho ya zwishumiswa zwa tsireledzo zwa muthu ene muṋe u vhona uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe o tsireledzea musi e mushumoni.
tgt_text: ukulindela ukwe nyuka kwesibalo so kwesuleleka nge gciwaneumongameli uramapho sa uthi, ukulungiselela u kwenyuka kwesiba lo sabantu abaphe thwe igciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezweni, kunemibhede yasezi bhedlela eyizi20 000, futhi, ihlelelwe izigameko zeco vid19, kanye nezibhedlela zesikhashana ezingama27 esezakhiwe ezweni jikelele.

src_text: vho amba uri: "tsha ndemesa kha riṋe ndi u fhungudza zwikhala zwa phiriso ya vairasi na u ita vhupo ho tsireledzeaho kha muṅwe na muṅwe.
tgt_text: "ezinye zalezi zibhedlela seziqalile ukwamukela iziguli ezinegciwane lecorona."

src_text: tsivhudzo dzine vha tea u tevhela u thivhela u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona .
tgt_text: umongameli uthi uhulumeni uyawubonga umsebenzi wezisebenzi zikahulumeni, ikakhulukazi labo abaphambili empini yokulwa nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19).

src_text: »kha vha dzule hayani nga nḓila dzoṱhe dzine dza konadzea.
tgt_text: "ukuphepha kwabo bonke abasebenzi, kubandakanya izisebenzi zikahulumeni, kuyingxe nye yokukhathazeka kwethu sonke.

src_text: »vha humbule u sia tshikhala vhukati ha vhone na muṅwe muthu.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka nokwenza imizamo ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza zokuzivikela ezanele ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha kwawo wonke umuntu ngesikhathi esemsebenzini .

src_text: »kha vha ambare masiki wavho.
tgt_text: "esikubeke eqhulwini uku qala ukwehlisa amathuba okusabalala kwegciwane lecorona kanye nokwenza indawo ephephile yawo wo nke umuntu," kusho yena.

src_text: »kha vha ṱambe zwanḓa zwavho nga vhuronwane.
tgt_text: amasu okumele uwalandele ukuze ugweme ukwesuleleka ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: vha ṱanzwe nga murahu ha zwanḓa zwavho, vhukati ha minwe na ngomu ha ṋala.
tgt_text: »hlala ekhaya ngayo yonke indlela.

src_text: vha dzulele u ṱamba zwanḓa nga tshisibe musi vha sa athu ḽa na musi vho vha vho bva vho ya fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: »khumbula ukuziqhelelanisa nabantu »gqoka isifonyo sakho sobuso »hlanzisisa izandla zakho ngensipho.

src_text: »kha vha thivhe mulomo wavho nga thishu musi vha tshi hoṱola na u atsamula.
tgt_text: geza izandla zakho macala onke, phakathi neminwe kanye naphansi kwezinzipho.

src_text: vha ṱutshele zwa u kwama tshifhaṱuwo nga zwanḓa zwi re na tshika tshifhinga tshoṱhe.
tgt_text: hlanza izandla zakho njalo ngensipho ngaphambi kokudla nasemva kokuba nabantu.

src_text: arali vho zwi ita, kha vha vhone zwauri tsha u thoma vha ṱamba zwanḓa zwavho nga tshisibe nga vhuronwane.
tgt_text: »vala umlomo wakho ngethishu uma ukhwehlela futhi uthimula.

src_text: »kha vha ṱoḓe thuso ya zwa dzilafho arali vha sa ḓipfi zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: gwema ukuzithintathinta ubuso ngezandla ezingcolile ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src_text: tsumbadwadze dzi vhonalaho dza covid19 muvhilini zwi katela u hoṱola, lumilaḓi, mufhiso na u fhelelwa nga mufemo.
tgt_text: »thola ukwelashwa uma ungaphilanga kahle.

src_text: arali vha tshenzhema iṅwe ya tsumbadwadze idzi, kha vha ṱoḓe thuso ya zwa dzilafho nga u ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: izimpawu ezijwayelekile zecovid 19 emzimbeni zibandakanya ukukhwehlela, ikhala eligxazayo, imfiva kanye nokuvaleka ukuphefumula.

src_text: za
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika iya esigabeni sokuqapha sesithathu vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uye wamemezela enku lumweni yakhe ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika seyedlulele esigabeni sesithathu ma nje nokuqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangulana nemikhakha eminingi eyehlukene ivulile ukusebenza nokuxegiswa kwemikhawulo yokuhamba kwabantu.

src_text: vhaswa vha sa ndi vhubvo ha ṱhuṱhuwedzo na fulufhelo vukuzenzele unnamed maipfi a uri ‘murafho muṅwe na muṅwe u fanela u tumbula mishini wawo’ a ḓa muhumbuloni tshifhinga tshoṱhe ndi tshi wana tshikhala tsha u amba na vhaswa vha afrika tshipembe.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika ingumthombo wogqozi nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amazwi kafrantz fanon athi 'isizukulwane ngasinye kumele sithole impokophelo yaso' ayangifikela njalo uma nginethuba lokukhuluma nabantu baseningizimu afrika abasebasha.

src_text: hu si na ndavha uri vha dzula ngafhi na uri vha ita mini, muṅwe na muṅwe u na vhudugambilu ha u shandukisa ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: noma ngabe bahlala kuphi futhi noma ngabe benzani, bonke ngamunye banentshisekelo yokushintsha umhlaba.

src_text: musi zwi zwone uri vha ṱoḓa u khwinisa matshilo a vhone vhaṋe, vha dovha vha ṱoḓa u swikela tshitshavha tsha khwine na ḽifhasi ḽa khwine.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi befuna ngokungangabazeki ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabo, bafuna futhi ukuba nomphakathi ongcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

src_text: vha ḓivhona sa mazhendedzi a tshanduko ya mutheo.
tgt_text: bazibona bengamanxusa enguquko eyisisekelo.

src_text: kha ḓivhazwakale yoṱhe vhaswa vho dzulela u vha vharangaphanḓa vha tshanduko.
tgt_text: emlandweni abantu abasha bebelokhu behola ukuletha uguquko.

src_text: kha miṅwaha ya fumi i si gathi yo fhiraho, vhaswa vho tshimbidza mafulo a nndwa o vhalaho a vhushayavhulamukanyi, u bva kha mugwalabo wa matshudeni wa 1968 ngei paris, u ya kha dzangano ḽi hanedzanaho na dzinndwa ngei united state miṅwahani ya 1960, u ya kha nndwa ya u lwa na vhukoḽoni kha mashango manzhi a afrika na asia, u ya kha nndwa na muvhuso wa tshiṱalula, u ya kha arab spring.
tgt_text: emashumini eminyaka embalwa edlulile, abantu abasha sebelwe izimpi eziningi zomzabalazo belwela ukungabikho kobulungiswa, kusuka ngowe1968 kumbhikisho wabafundi eparis, kuya kumkhankaso ophikisana nempi emelika ngowe1960, kuya kumzabalazo ophikisana nobuqonela emazweni amaningi aseafrika naseasia, kuya ekulweni nobandlululo, kuya kumibhikisho yokulwela inkululeko yamaarab iarab spring.

src_text: zwenezwino, vhaswa vho vha vhone vhe vha ranga phanḓa fulo ḽa #blacklivesmatter ḽe ḽa wana thikhedzo ḽifhasini u bva kha bulayo ḽa tshiṱuhu ḽa vho george floyd ngei united states.
tgt_text: kungekudala nje, abantu abasha bebephambili kumkhankaso we #blacklivesmatter ozuze ukwesekwa umhlaba jikelele emva kokubulawa kukageorge floyd emelika.

src_text: kha vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho, vhalwelatshanduko u mona na ḽifhasi vho dovha vha ṱoḓa nga khani u bviswa ha zwiga zwi hulisaho zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu na khakhathi dza mbambadzo ya phuli na zwa vhukoḽoni.
tgt_text: emavikini ambalwa adlule, izishoshovu emhlabeni jikelele bezilokhu zifuna kususwe imifanekiso etusa ubulwane nodlame lokuhweba ngezigqila kanye nobuqonela.

src_text: kha migwalabo ya ngei oxford university ya zwenezwino mugwalabi o hwala puḽakhadi i na maipﬁ a ‘rhodes must fall’, tshe tsha vha tshi tshililo tsha fulo ḽa matshudeni kha shango ḽashu mihwahani miṱanu yo fhiraho.
tgt_text: embhikishweni wasenyuvesi yaseoxford muva nje umbhikishi wayephethe uqwembe olunamagama athi 'rhodes must fall", ukukhala okuhlangene kwabafundi ezweni lethu eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule.

src_text: vhaswa u mona na ḽifhasi vho wana tshilwelwa tshi fanaho.
tgt_text: abantu abasha emhlabeni jikelele bathole isisusa esisodwa.

src_text: vha khou wisa na u kwashekanya zwiṱetshu na zwiga zwa khethululo nga muvhala, vha ṱoḓa u bviswa kha ndaulo ya kharikhuḽamu ya zwa pfunzo ya vhukoḽoni, na u ita khuwelelo kha zwiimiswa uri zwi tandulule fhungo ḽa khethululo nga muvhala na u sa katelwa kha sisṱeme dza matshilisano.
tgt_text: babhidliza izithombe ezibaziwe nemifanekiso ecwasa ngokobuhlanga, bafuna kukhululwe ezemfundo, futhi bafuna zonke izikhungo zibhekane nokucwaswa ngokobuhlanga nangokwenhlalo.

src_text: ngauralo, musi ri khou elelwa murafho wa 1976 nga ḽa 16 fulwi 2020, ri dovha ra ṱhonifha vhaswa vha nga murahu ha muvhuso wa tshiṱalula afrika tshipembe, vhaḽaifa vho teaho vha ifa iḽi ḽa mikhwa yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: manje, njengoba sihlonipha isizukulwane sangowe1976 mhla ziyi16 nhlangulana 2020, sithulela isigqoko intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangasemva kobandlululo, izindlalifa ezifanelwe yileli lifa elihle kangaka.

src_text: mishini wa murafho wa 1976 ho vha hu u fhelisa pfunzo ya ‘bantu’; fhedzi ya vhaswa vha zwino ndi u isa phanḓa thandela ya pfumedzano na tshandukiso ya lushaka.
tgt_text: umsebenzi wesizukulwane sangowe1976 kwakungukushabalalisa imfundo yobandlululo; okumele intsha yanamuhla iqhubele phambili umsebenzi wokubuyisana nokwenza izinguquko ezweni.

src_text: kha tshifhinga tshi ḓaho hu ḓo ambiwa uri ṅwaha uno, wa 2020, wo swaya mathomo a tshifhinga tshiswa kha ḓivhazwakale ya muthu.
tgt_text: esikhathini esizayo kuzothiwa lo nyaka, wezi2020, kwakungukuqala kwesikhathi esisha emlandweni wabantu.

src_text: tshitzhili tsha corona a tshi ngo vha na masiandaitwa mahulwanesa kha matshilo a vhathu na nḓila ya u kona u ḓitshelela fhedzi, fhedzi tsho dovha tsha dzinginya nzudzanyo ya ḽifhasi ya matshilisano.
tgt_text: igciwane lecorona aligcinanga nje ngokuthinta kanzima izimpilo zabantu kanye nokuphila, liphinde lanyakazisa ukuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: nga nḓila ye dwadze ḽa dzhia ngayo ndaulo ndi khumbudzo ya vhuṱumani ha lushaka lwa vhathu na vhushayandingano huhulwanesa hune ha vha hone vhukati ha mashango na nga ngomu ha mashango.
tgt_text: indlela ubhubhane olube yiyona lusikhumbuze ukuxhumana kwezinhlanga zabantu kanye nokungalingani okujulile okukhona phakathi kwamazwe naphakathi emazweni.

src_text: dwadze ḽi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha u ‘vusa nga huswa’ ḽifhasi ḽo vhumbwaho nga ndaka kana thundu fhedzi hu si na vhuṱali, u humbulela iwe muṋe fhedzi na u sedza iwe muṋe fhedzi hu si kha sia ḽa vhathu fhedzi, fhedzi na kha zwitshavha nga u angaredza.
tgt_text: lolu bhubhane lusinika ithuba 'lokulungisa kabusha' umhlaba esiwubona ngobulima bokuqhakambisa izinto ngokweqile, ubugovu kanye nokuzithiba hhayi nje kwicala lomuntu ngamunye kodwa emiphakathini yonke.

src_text: vhaswa vha khou ri vhudza uri mikhwa ya mutheo wa vhungoho, u pfela vhuṱungu na vhuthihi zwi fanela u vha zwiganḓo zwa tshitshavha tshiswa tshine tsha ḓo bvelela, na u ḓiimisela u vha dzingweṋa dza ḽifhasi iḽi ḽiswa ḽa khwine.
tgt_text: abantu abasha basitshela ukuthi amagugu abalulekile obuqotho, isihawu kanye nobumbano kumele kube izimpawu zomphumela womphakathi omusha, nokuthi bazimisele ukuba ngamaqhawe alo mhlaba omusha, ongcono.

src_text: kha nyambedzano dze nda vha nadzo na vhaswa ndo amba uri a ri tei u dzhiela fhasi maanḓa a muhumbulo, ngauri muhumbulo u nga kha ḓi, nahone wo shandukisa ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nabantu abasha ngithe akumele sibukele phansi amandla ombono, ngoba imibono ingashintsha futhi isishintshe umhlaba.

src_text: mihumbulo yo ṱuṱuwedza mvelaphanḓa ya muthu nahone ndi yone ine ya ḓo ri konisa u rekhoda nḓila ntswa kha tshifhinga tshi ḓaho tsha nga murahu ha tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: imibono isikhuthaze inqubekelaphambili yabantu futhi iyona ezokwenza sikwazi ukuphendla indlela entsha esikhathini sangemva kwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: vhaswa avha vha shandukisa mihumbulo yavho ya vha nyito.
tgt_text: laba bantu abasha baguqule imibono yabo yaba izenzo.

src_text: a vha ngo tendela ṱhahelelo ya zwiko i tshi vha ima phanḓa.
tgt_text: abavumelanga ukuntuleka kwezinsiza kubaphazamise.

src_text: vho ḓisikela zwikhala vhone vhaṋe kha sekhithara dzo vhalaho u bva kha dzi shumisaho thekhinoḽodzhi u ya kha ṱhogomelo yo khwaṱhaho ya zwa mupo.
tgt_text: bazitholele intuba emikhakheni eminingi kusuka ebuchwephesheni obuphezulu kuya ekugcinweni kwemvelo.

src_text: zwino u fhira na mathomoni ri sedza kha muya wa zwa vhutumbuli na wa u lingedza zwithu zwiswa nga vhaswa vhashu uri vha ḓe na thandululo dza thaidzo dza vhushayamushumo dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhone vhaṋe, zwitshavha zwavho na vhadzulapo.
tgt_text: manje ukudlula ekuqaleni sizobheka umfutho wentshayakithi wokusungula nokuqamba izinto ukuza nezisombululo zosizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi ezizosiza bona, nemiphakathi yabo.

src_text: nga tshifhinga tshenetshi, ndi itela khaedu vhaswa vha shango ḽashu u sika na u ola mbekanyamushumo dzine dza ḓo ri ita uri ri swikele zwipikwa zwashu zwa mveledziso.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi esifanayo, ngiphosela inselele intsha yezwe lakithi ukusungula nokuqamba izinhlelo ezizosisiza ukufezekisa amaphupho ethu okuthuthuka.

src_text: nga 1961, shango ḽa cuba ḽo wanaho tshanduko, ḽo rumela gogo ḽa matshudeni a vhaswa vha sa shumeli malamba u ya dzithavhani na miḓanani u fhaṱa zwikolo, u funza u vhala na u ṅwala na u pfumbudza vhagudisi vhaswa.
tgt_text: ngowe1961, icuba eguqukileyo yathumela ibutho labafundi abangamavolontiya abasebasha ezintabeni nasezigodini ukuyokwakha izikole, bafundise ukufunda nokubhala nokuqeqesha othisha abasha.

src_text: u swika zwino, ḽi kha ḓi dzhiiwa sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mafulo a u gudisa u ṅwala na u vhala a dzhielwaho nṱha e a bvelela vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale u swika zwino.
tgt_text: namanje usathathwa njengomkhankaso oyimpumelelo kakhulu kunayo yonke emlandweni wesimanje.

src_text: vhaswa vhashu vha fanela u bveledzisa vhurangeli ha u khwinifhadza matshilo nahone vha fanela u vhu ranga phanḓa.
tgt_text: abantu bakithi abasha kumele basungule imizamo yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi futhi kumele kube yibona abayiholayo.

src_text: sa musi vha tshi dzhia nndwa ya ndinganyiso ya pfunzo ya nṱha, mafulufulu mahulwane a vhaswa vhashu a fanela u dovha a shumiswa kha u lwa nndwa ya tswikelelo i linganaho ya ndondolo ya mutakalo, u itela tshanduko na vhuṋe ha mavu, zwa vhuṱhogwa vhukuma, kha vhulamukanyi ha zwa mbeu.
tgt_text: njengoba benza emzabalazweni wokulwela ukulingana emfundweni ephakeme, umfutho omkhulu wentsha yakithi kumele usetshenziswe ukulwela ukufinyelela okulinganayo ekunakekelweni ngokwezempilo, ekuguquleni nakubunikazi bomhlaba futhi, okubaluleke kakhulu, ubulungiswa ngokobulili.

src_text: u fana na maafrika tshipembe vhoṱhe, ndo vhaiswa vhukuma nga u hulela ha mabulayo a vhafumakadzana zwanḓani zwa vhanna.
tgt_text: njengabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika, ngiphazamiseke kakhulu ukwenyuka kwezinga lokubulawa kwabesifazane abasebancane bebulawa ngamadoda.

src_text: hezwi ndi zwiito zwi shushaho zwa tshiṱuhu tshihulu nahone a zwi ṱanganedzei na luthihi kha shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: lezi izenzo ezithusayo zobulwane ezingenandawo emphakathini wakithi.

src_text: vhulwelatshanduko ha vhadzulapo ho rangwaho phanḓa nga vhaswa, u ḓisa tsivhudzo na khuthadzo nga mirole ndi zwishumiswa zwa vhuṱhogwa kha ndingedzo dzashu dza u fhelisa khakhathi dzo livhiswaho kha mbeu u bva kha tshitshavha.
tgt_text: ubushoshovu obuholwa yintsha, ukuqwashisa kanye nokwelulekana kwentsha yizona zikhali zethu emizamweni yethu yokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile emphakathini.

src_text: nga tshifhinga tshenetshi, ri fanela u khwaṱhisa sisṱeme dzashu dza vhulamukanyi, u khwaṱhisedza uri vhatshinyi vha khou fariwa, milayo ya beiḽi na paruḽa i khou vhofhiwa ya khwaṱha na uri avho vhane vha gwevhiwa u dzula dzhele vhutshilo havho hoṱhe vha fhedza matshilo avho vho valelwa dzhele.
tgt_text: ngaso lesi sikhathi, kumele siqinise uhlelo lwethu lobulungiswa, siqinisekise ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyajeziswa, kuqiniswe imithetho yebheyili noshwele nokuthi labo asebegwetshwe udilikajele babhadla ejele impilo yabo yonke.

src_text: musi izwi zwi tshi ṱoḓa vhukando ha tshitshavha nga vhuphara, ndi ita khuwelo kha vhanna vha vhaswa nga maanḓa kha u lwisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi lokhu kudingaumsebenzi womphakathi wonke, ngicela amadoda ikakhulukazi asemancane ukuqala umzabalazo wokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src_text: arali ra sa fhelisa nndwa ine ya khou itelwa vhafumakadzi vha afrika tshipembe, muḽoro wa tshitshavha tshiswa u ḓo dzula u ḽifhedzi.
tgt_text: uma singaqeda impi ebhekiswe kwabesifazane baseningizimu afrika, iphupho lomphakathi omusha lizolokhu liyize leze.

src_text: riṋe re ra vha ri tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a matshudeni nga tshifhinga tsha muvhuso wa tshiṱalula ri dzulela u vhudziswa uri ri humbula mini nga vhaswa vha ano maḓuvha.
tgt_text: labo bethu ababeyingxenye yombhikisho wabafundi ngesikhathi sobandlululo sihlezi sibuzwa ukuthi sicabangani ngentsha yanamuhla.

src_text: hu na mulingo wa u humela murahu kha lutamo lwa kale nga ha ‘maḓuvha a madakalo’ a polotiki dza matshudeni na nndwa ya vhaswa, hezwi a zwi tei u dovhololwa.
tgt_text: kunokulingeka okukhona kokuﬁ sa ukubuyela emuva 'ezinsukwini ezimnandi' zepolitiki yabafundi nomzabalazo wentsha, okungeke kuphinde kube khona.

src_text: fhedzi sa vhaswa vha miṅwaha yo fhiraho vho ṱalutshedza mishini wavho, vhaswa vha ṋamusi na vhone vho ṱalutshedza mishini wavho.
tgt_text: kodwa ngendlela intsha yangonyaka odlule echaze ngayo umsebenzi wayo, intsha yanamuhla iwuchazile owayo.

src_text: vhaswa vha afrika tshipembe vha 2020 vha swikela maimo a nṱha zwo tiwaho nga vho vha rangelaho phanḓa.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangowezi2020 iyaﬁ ka ebangeni eliphezulu elabekwa abangaphambili.

src_text: vha na mafulufulu, vho ḓikumedzela na u vha na tshivhindi, kanzhi nga tshifhinga tsha nyimele dzi konḓesaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: banethemba, bayabekezela futhi banesibindi, ikakhulukazi uma bebhekene nesimo esinzima kakhulu.

src_text: vhaswa ndi vhubvo ha ṱhuṱhuwedzo na fulufhelo.
tgt_text: bangumthombo wogqozi nethemba.

src_text: nga kha nyito dzavho, vha khou fhaṱa ḽifhasi ḽine ḽa vha na zwinzhi, ḽi linganaho, ḽo khwaṱhaho na u vha na mulalo.
tgt_text: ngezenzo zabo, bakha umhlaba ongaphezu nje, kokulingana, osimeme futhi onokuthula.

src_text: vvhaswa u mona na ḽifhasi vha khou ita khuwelelo kha zwiimiswa uri zwi fhelise khethululo nga muvhala na u sielwa nnḓa kha zwa matshilisano.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika ingumthombo wogqozi nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amazwi kafrantz fanon athi 'isizukulwane ngasinye kumele sithole impokophelo yaso' ayangifikela njalo uma nginethuba lokukhuluma nabantu baseningizimu afrika abasebasha.

src_text: mme vha na malwadze a sa fholi vho kunda covid19 silusapho nyanda vho insaaf mohammed vhari ndi zwa ndeme vhukuma uri maafrika tshipembe nga mannḓa avho vha na malwadze a sa fholiho uri vha dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho.
tgt_text: umama onesifo esiyimbelesela unqobe icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulukazi labo abanezifo eziyimbelesela bazibophezele empilweni yabo.

src_text: vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho – u fana na asima, mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho na ha swigiri – vha nga tshenzhema tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzi re khombo, nahone vha nga lovha nga vhanga ḽa mutsiko une tshitzhili tsha hwedza mivhili yavho.
tgt_text: abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela – njengesifuba somoya, umfutho wegazi ophakeme, izifo eziyimbelesela ezihambisana nezinso kanye nesifo sikashukela – bangahlangabezana nezimpawu zegciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezibucayi kakhulu, futhi bangafa nokufa ngenxa yengcindezi elethwa yileli gciwane emzimbeni yabo.

src_text: mashudu mavhuya, musi occupational therapist na mme wa vhana vhararu vho insaaf mohammed (40) vho wanwa vha na covid19 musi vha na vhulwadze ha asima, vho kona u langa malwadze aya oṱhe nahone vha sa tou lwalesa.
